```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.height=15, fig.width=12, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(gridExtra)
library(grid)
library(NLMR)
random <- randomNLM(50,50)
p1 <- nlmr_plot(random)
distagrad <- distancegradientNLM(50, 50, c(10,15,10,15))
p2 <- nlmr_plot(distagrad)
edgy <- edgegradientNLM(50,50)
p3 <- nlmr_plot(edgy)
planary <- planargradientNLM(50,50)
p4 <- nlmr_plot(planary)
randomRecClustery <- randomRectangularClusterNLM(50, 50, 8, 16)
p5 <- nlmr_plot(randomRecClustery)
randomElementy <- randomElementNLM(50,50, 90)
p6 <- nlmr_plot(randomElementy)
randomClustery <- randomClusterNLM(50,50, n = 4)
p7 <- nlmr_plot(randomClustery)
randomMPD <- mpdNLM(100,100)
p8 <- nlmr_plot(randomMPD)

grid.draw(grid.arrange(p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, p6, p7, p8, ncol=2))

```
